item.title: Log Create Mypage
item.description: From downloading Hugo to deploying to github pages. Install hugo with brew. brew install hugo Select and download the hugo theme PaperMod. hugo new site (myreponame).github.io cd (myreponame).github.io git init. # init git repo. create config.yml PaperMod recommends using yml rather than toml. Add this line to config.yml theme: "PaperMod"
